title.rendered: EZ Rankings Ranks No. 61 Among U.S. SEO Companies

content.rendered:
EZ Rankings ranked No. 61 among all SEO Companies in the United States in a study published Thursday by SEOblog.com. This ranking was based on search engine results pages (SERPs) dominance identified from 35 million search results.

Radu Plugaru, a Romanian SEO expert who founded SEOlium.com, conducted this study in February in an effort to understand which U.S. SEO companies rank high for eight top-performing, SEO-related search terms. These include:

  • SEO agency 
  • SEO consultant
  • SEO services
  • SEO company
  • SEO expert
  • PPC agency
  • Google Ads agency
  • Digital marketing agency

In his study, Plugaru combined these eight keywords with all of the almost 42,000 U.S. zip codes. This method produced more than 341,000 search phrases, which generated about 35 million search results.  Plugaru used his rank tracker tool to compile a list of the top-performing U.S. websites among 25,000 search domains.

Plugaru told SEOblog.com that he further narrowed down the research into the top U.S. SEO agencies and consultants. Overall, EZ Rankings ranked No. 61 among all U.S. SEO Companies and consultants, with a 42,939 SERPs count.

EZ Rankings, listed among SEOblog’s best SEO companies, is an award-winning digital marketing company. We take pride in providing a 360-degree approach to online marketing. Our specialized services focus on search engine optimization (SEO), reputation management, local SEO, website development, white-label SEO and social media marketing.

Throughout the years, we’ve partnered with multiple clients from startups and small enterprises to large companies. We’ve worked with numerous businesses in creating brand awareness and increasing their revenue. The results of this study simply show that we keep our word in building brands brick by brick.

Give us a call or fill out our contact form to learn more about how one of the leading SEO companies can help your company achieve online success. Partner with us and let us build a robust foundation for your brand’s online presence.
